clinical_study.brief_title: Informing the Adaptation of a CHW Model to Facilitate Lung Cancer Screening for Chinese Taxi Drivers
clinical_study.official_title: Informing the Adaptation of a CHW Model to Facilitate Lung Cancer Screening for Chinese Taxi Drivers

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to improve the efforts of Community health workers (CHWs) by developing materials to help increase lung cancer screening in NYC Chinese taxi drivers who smoke or who have quit smoking within the past 15 years.

primary_outcome.measure: Manual for Facilitating Lung Cancer Screening,
primary_outcome.description: For example, selected passages and codes can be connected in diagrams to allow researchers to develop constructs for developing the adapted CHW intervention materials based on visible relationships

arm_group.description: The investigators will conduct a series of 4-6 focus groups with Chinese livery drivers who (currently, or in the past) smoke, and a series of 12-15 in-depth interviews with livery base management and staff, and with 12-15 primary care physicians (PCPs), clinic directors, hospital CFOs, heads of financial services and counseling, and heads of radiology facilities serving the Chinese community. Both focus group and in-depth interview methodologies have previously been used successfully to explore barriers and factors related to cancer screening among both male and female Chinese immigrants. Focus groups and in-depth interviews will be 75-90 minutes in duration.

study_pop.textblock: Participants for the focus groups will be recruited in concert with 6-8 Chinese livery bases identified through our preliminary work, the Taxi Network, 3 of which previously collaborated with us in our health needs assessment.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Focus Group Participants:
- Of Chinese descent
- Non-U.S. born
- Fluent in Mandarin
- Livery driver
- Age 45-80
- Current or past (within 15 years) cigarette smoker (no specific pack year requirement)
In Depth Interview Participants Livery Staff
- Of Chinese descent
- Non-U.S. born
- Fluent in Mandarin
- Livery base owner or employee
- Age ≥ 21
Health Care Providers and Administrators:
- Primary care physician, clinic director, hospital administrator, or radiology facility or department administrator
- Age ≥ 21
- Fluent in English
Preliminary Pilot testing-Community Members
- Fluent in Mandarin AND English
- Age ≥ 21
Exclusion Criteria:
- Has a household member who has already participated (or agreed to participate).
